content: The target tier policy talks about target maintainers, but I can't find where these are actually listed.
Oh, I see that https://doc.rust-lang.org/rustc/platform-support.html has some sub-pages that list maintainers -- but does that mean we only have four targets with a maintainer?
In particular, I'd like to know who maintains the illumos target.
@Nikita Popov Only targets that have been added (or updated) since the target tier policy have pages listing maintainers and documentation. Eventually, we'd like all targets to have those.
For now, you might try looking at the git history of that target's files in rust-lang/rust to see who added it and who maintains it.
There's a set of folks for illumos (we should ask them to document) - you can probably start by pinging @Steve Klabnik
